title: Jackie Chan - How to Do Action Comedy

media:group.media:title: Jackie Chan - How to Do Action Comedy
media:group.media:description:
Some filmmakers can do action. Others can do comedy. But for 40 years, the master of combining them has been Jackie Chan. Letâ€™s see how he does it. (Note: to see the names of the films, press the CC button!)

The 9 Principles of Action Comedy
1. Start with a DISADVANTAGE
2. Use the ENVIRONMENT
3. Be CLEAR in your shots
4. Action & Reaction in the SAME frame
5. Do as many TAKES as necessary
6. Let the audience feel the RHYTHM
7. In editing, TWO good hits = ONE great hit
8. PAIN is humanizing
9. Earn your FINISH
